title: Fort Monroe National Monument: Things To Do
body: Things To Do         Casemate Museum Link Fort Monroe Casemate Museum  Other Links The Center of Military History Virginia Tourism Hampton Virginia Visitors Bureau   Â      Battery Church at Sunset. NPS Photo  The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016! The Centennial will kick off a second century of stewardship of America's national parks and engaging communities through recreation, conservation, and historic preservation programs. Joint the celebration to explore, learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in over 400 national parks.  An exciting part of this Centennial celebration is the Find Your Park campaign. Everyone is encouraged to visit and share your pictures and experiences at:findyourpark.com. The combination of nature, history, recreation, scenic views, and unobstructed sunrise and sunsets make Fort Monroe an excellent choice to FindYourPark.
